about_the_game:
Additional graphical content for worshipers of female orgasms. Especially with pussy squirts!
  • 10 card sets (solo, lesbian, masturbating together, with guy, orgies)
  • 364 backgrounds
  • 520 card backs (use the same images as card sets)
  • 52 pictures to use in UI pop-ups and similar
  • 520 images are available for custom minigames. Make sure to set field tiling to roughly match the image proportions, to avoid cropping important detail (face, pussy).

Note: some backgrounds may be too colorful for some card sets. The new "bg color overlay" slider and a color picker in Options->Graphics will let you adjust backgrounds the way that feels best for you.

Images were AI-generated, with a lot of my manual sketches involved in the iterations.

Images are 2048 pixels in the bigger dimension. You could use them e.g. as wallpapers on your smartphone, laptop or other device. In Steam Library, select NSFW Solitaire, press "gear" button (Manage), Manage, Browse local files. This will open the game's folder in the file browser. Open DLC_Squirts/Pictures. There in subfolders are 520 pictures. Squirts_solo_v should be fine for a phone. And for laptop: solo_h, lesbian, masturbating_together, with_guy, and gangbang.

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit depiction of female genitalia, specifically female ejaculation ("pussy squirt") during orgasm. Nude female bodies, sexual poses, lesbian sexual interactions.

pc_requirements.minimum:

short_description: Additional pussy squirt-themed card sets for NSFW Solitaire. Also, backs, backgrounds, UI pictures and images for custom minigames.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Croatian, Serbian, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
